articles.title: Hong Kong fire : Death toll rises to 146 as thousands pay their respects
articles.summary: Hong Kong fire death toll rises to 146 as thousands pay respects 19 hours ago Share Save Hafsa Khalil Share Save Reuters At least 146 people are now known to have died in the devastating fire that tore through high-rise buildings in Hong Kong on Wednesday. Police announced the new death toll on Sunday, cautioning that they 'cannot rule out the possibility of further fatalities'. There are still 150 people missing, and the blaze left 79 injured. S
